text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Alright! It's a bit early, but we have some leeway, so let's leave 
the rest for tomorrow. Enjoy your free time, everyone.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
I heard there are climbing walls in the activity area. 
I will go try those out for a while.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ooh… disciplined even in how she uses her rest time… 
I'm just gonna take it easy and soak in the hot springs.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Yay! Hey, hey, Chevacchi, Chevacchiiii, let's go shopping! 
We have to get sis gifts!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Eh? Ah, right. Um… how about joining us, Crown… ? I think… it will be fun.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Hehe, if it's souvenirs for your sister, you two should go together.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
I still have to check through all the photos we've taken, so I'll 
go back for now. I also want to think about the remainder of 
the photo shoot.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Oh… okay.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
—— Yes, the location for the final day's shoot is 
as stated in the list I sent. I'll explain in greater 
detail afterwar— Yes, yes.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Yes, thank you and goodbye. 
…Oh, welcome back. Had fun looking for souvenirs?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Yes, fortunately. …Although Vivlos bought 
way too much for herself too.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Eeeh, this is totally normal… Ah! Crown, are you looking 
at the photos from the pool shoot? Show us, show us♪

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: This has a super good feel about it☆

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: If only we also got a photo of Crown going "Kyaaa" that time, it was so funny.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Th-There's no need for that!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
…If you're referring to that time 
at the water slide, they do exist.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: ……Eh. Wh-When did that happen……?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
The slide had the functionality to automatically take photos 
as you were sliding down. Unfortunately, the quality is not 
good enough for promotional use ——

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Aaah! Aaah! I didn't hear you! I still have a meeting and 
some work to do! I'll see you all again at dinner!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…She left… Did she get embarrassed…? 
By the way, how does the photo look ——

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Puh! It's not a surprise, given how much she was screaming. But… I think it's honestly a really good expression… hehe.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (I wonder what other expressions Crown makes…… but, huh?)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Duramente. Although we've been photographed plenty, 
it seems Crown has had hardly any photos taken of her.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
It might be difficult while she's acting as the planner. 
Especially so now that the direction of the shoot 
has been revamped.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
You're the first one I asked, you know, Cheval? 
If you're willing to join, I'm sure the photos will 
turn out amazing.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: …Hehe. Yes. You, as you are now, really are the best photo model.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(Is it okay to leave it at that…? To only have 
such great photos taken of us… To end it like 
that and say we've done well… That ——)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Would be… such a pity.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: You mean… about Crown?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
After all, because Crown… invited me here… 
I'm able to like the way I am a bit now…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: And yet… for Crown to leave without anything…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
It would be a pity… and I don't want that. 
I think Crown should have an experience 
to take with her as well. That's why ——

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: I want to give Crown what I… what we have experienced here. So that all of us can smile and discover the expressions that come from the bottom of our hearts… together.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Contrast adjustment of the photos for the promo magazine 
is hereby… done! At least I can send these to the PR manager 
now… Oh? It's already late.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Nnngh! My body's all stiff. …Perhaps I should go swimming for a bit. This swimwear should be fine for a quick swim…

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: ……Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mysterious Sunglassed Horsegirl 1
text_block_list.text: Sta… Start the operation!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Hweeeeh!?
